G

Game - Class in gametools
Manages game input, the game window and the output displayed.
Game() - Constructor for class gametools.Game
Initializes the game and runs the window method.
gametools - package gametools
A lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.
gametools.gravity - package gametools.gravity
Package containing additional tools for creating a side scroller styled game with gravity.
